name: The Spirit's Tale
description:
Use the mysterious power of the shadows to solve puzzles and avoid enemies. Will you be able to complete your journey?

Controls: Keyboard/Xbox Controller

Move : W A D / Left Stick + D-Pad
Shadow Form: S / Left Bumper
Dash : Left Click / Right Bumper
Attack : Right Click / X
Jump : Space / A
Interact : E / B
Puzzle Hints : Q / Y
Pause : Esc / Start
